messages.title: Working for Dundee
messages.content: Over the last 18 years under Labour, significant investments have been made across Britain, including demolishing the multistoreys and replacing them with Mixed Media Studios, and that there's more that still needs replacing. Gordon Brown's Conservative plans for the future of Britain involve cutting public sector jobs and enforcing an economic strategy leading to a decade of low growth and austerity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Katrina will be accountable to you and you alone, not Westminster or the party machine.
Katrina has the skills and business knowledge to bring lasting good jobs and investment to Dundee.
Katrina wants to make sure that responsibility for healthcare and children's services are closer to you.
Katrina will work to maintain and improve local identity, community spirit and cohesiveness.
Katrina will support families and the economy, steering through the recovery and promoting jobs in Dundee.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The real choice at this Election is between Labour or Tory.

issues.economy: Gordon Brown's Conservative plans for the future of Britain involve cutting public sector jobs and enforcing an economic strategy leading to a decade of low growth and austerity.

housing.content: Demolishing the multistoreys and replacing them with Mixed Media Studios, and that there's more that still needs replacing.

contactInformation.address: Dundee Labour Party, 7 West Wynd, Dundee, DD1 4JQ

endorsements.endorsement: I know Katrina Murray from her excellent work with FEA. She is a person of integrity who will work hard... and she will do a great job for Dundee East.

quotes.text: I know Katrina Murray from her excellent work with FEA. She is a person of integrity who will work hard... and she will do a great job for Dundee East.

images.caption: Katrina Murray standing by a 'Welcome to Dundee' sign.
Katrina Murray standing in front of Inveresk Gardens.
